__e: 2) What is the nature of the fight between Satan and the Church?

18/Al-Kahf-51: I did not make them (Lucifer and his offspring) witnesses of the creation of the heavens and the earth, nor of the creation of their own souls; nor I took those who leave (others) in Misguidance as helpers.
And Shaytan saying, “I am sending certified doctors from my academy to do every evil and dirtiness and oppressions from Mankind.”
Satan is prince of this world, he holds it in his hands.
He wants them to believe Satan's power is greater.
Satan is the god of this evil age. He is worshiped by how many people that don’t know it?
So Satan found the place in man and formed in him a false love, a love of self.
And the man couldn’t even speak himself; Satan spoke through him, “We are legions, for we are many.”
What if Satan created the world?
